p:
''Darkwood'' is a challenging and unforgiving top-down survival horror game in development by [https://www.acidwizardstudio.com/ Acid Wizard Studio].
The game is available on [https://store.steampowered.com/app/274520/ Steam] and [https://www.gog.com/game/darkwood GOG] for PC, Mac OS X, Linux, and SteamOS.
You can now also get ''Darkwood'' on the PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S and Nintendo Switch.

Check out our Beginner's Guide!

[[Characters]] ! [[Creatures]] ! [[Items]] ! [[Locations]] ! [[Mechanics]] ! [[Skills]] ! [[Weapons]] |}
div:
=== New player? === ---- ''Darkwood'' is a challenging and unforgiving game. What is there to say against a little help to get you started? Spoiler-free of course.
* The [[Beginner's Guide]] prepares you for the first few nights and highlights some of the more obscure game mechanics. * The [[Darkwood|Darkwood page]] gives you a general overview on the game. The perfect place to find out whether ''Darkwood'' is for you.

=== How to help ===
---- Feel free to [[Special:Userlogin|join us]] and contribute to this wiki. Everyone is free to create a new page or edit an [[Special:Allpages|existing one]].
Before you start however please read our editing guides: * [[Darkwood Wiki:Templates|Templates]] * Style Guide (soon) * [[Darkwood Wiki:Images|Images]] * [[Darkwood Wiki:Update policy|Update Policy]]
Any additional questions about wiki editing should be directed towards the [[Special:ListUsers/sysop|administrators]].
* New to wikis? Check out our [[Help:Contents|help page library]]. * Not sure where to start? [[:Category:Article stubs|Article stubs]] always need expansion. * Browse through wiki activity in [[Special:RecentChanges|Recent Changes]].

=== Administration ===
---- Any problems or questions? Contact administration: * [[User:Theacidwizard|Theacidwizard]] * [[User:Megix123|Megix123]] * [[User:KillerFRIEND|KillerFRIEND]]
